scripts.test: dotenv -- sh -c 'start-server-and-test "npm run start:dev > nul 2>&1" http://localhost:$PORT test:cypress'
scripts.dev: npm i && npm run seed && npm run build && npm run start:dev
scripts.dev:hot: concurrently "npm run server:dev" "wait-on tcp:3001 && cd client && npm run dev:local"
scripts.start: npm run build && npm run server
scripts.start:dev: npm run build:dev && npm run server
scripts.start:aws: npm run build:aws && npm run server
scripts.install: cd server && npm i && cd ../client && npm i
scripts.builder: concurrently "cd server && npm run build" "cd client && npm run build"
scripts.render-build: npm install && npm run clean && npm run install && npm run build
scripts.render-build:lambda: cd server && npm install && npm run build:lambda
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules && npm run clean:client && npm run clean:server
